Reviews.Title: Loved this camera!
Reviews.Author: Jacob D Ford
Reviews.Content: I got this camera based on a recomendation from a friend. It was everything i hoped for. Very easy to use, great pictures, compact. Only issue was it was stolen within a week of having it :(

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: ManderMoo
Reviews.Content: I should have known something was up when I bought this camera on sale. Pictures were blurry crap and it broke the first time I took it in the water.

ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix XP30 Blue GPS Digital Camera
